publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Thomas Underhill, at the Anchor and Bible in Pauls Church-yard near the little North-door, and Francis Tyton at the three Daggers in Fleet-street near Dunstons Church,

notesStmt.note: "An explication of some passages in the foregoing propositions and professionÂ· .. Written by Rich. Baxter", comprising the bulk of the item, has separate dated title page and begins pagination; register is continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 10"; on "An explication of some passages": "July 22".
Imperfect: frequent show-through; copy on reel 38 filmed without Baxter's "An explication" (leaves D1-T2), which appears separately on reel 247 as Thomason E.706[6].
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
